comments: Professor Canterbury has been teaching Anatomy for 10 years so he is comfortable with the content, but he occasionally gives students incorrect information during lectures. What\'s more frustrating, he interrupts students during exams to make announcements. Some of his jokes/anecdotes are unprofessional as well, and his assignments are unclear.

comments: Ronald is the most unprepared teacher I have ever had. He\'s a bird expert, not an anatomy prof, & it is more than obvious in his lecturing. Lecture is 1 hour lost that could\'ve been spent studying/learning on your own. Gives incorrect/incomplete descriptions when accuracy & precision are important (anatomy is particular). Take Nodzak if possible.

comments: I had Ron for Ornithology and it was such a great class. He\'s an incredibly laid back guy and has a great sense of humor. You can tell he wants his students to well above all else. He\'s really passionate about birds!

comments: This man has an indian slave named Pooja who should probably be teacing the class. Watch sitting in front of him as he tends to make it rain spit. He is a very cool dude and his accent will make you giggle. Very helpful and is pretty lenient on giving partial credit if he thinks you know what you are talking about

comments: I had Ron for Anatomy Lab, he is a great Professor. He\'ll help with any questions, redo any experiments, show you any dissection until you understand. He is great with getting back to you if you send him an email also. Anatomy lab is hard but absolutely loved him.
